heading: ***WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR THE BERKSHIRES THROUGH THIS EVENING***Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers diminishing, lingering through the northern and far southern mountains. Lows mainly in the low to mid 20s. West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Becoming mostly sunny south. Periods of clouds, and any snow showers in the northeastern mountains, giving way to increasing periods of afternoon sun. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, low to mid 30s south. West to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Clear early, then increasing clouds. Chance of late-night snow through NY. Lows in the low to mid 20s south and in the Champlain Valley, teens elsewhere north. Winds becoming light and variable, turning to the south near 10 mph west of the Green Mountains.

heading: Sunday
text: Occasional periods of snow, some light accumulations possible, mixing with rain in the valleys in the afternoon. Highs in the 30s to low 40s north to south. Winds becoming south to southeast 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.
